com.neovisionaries.jdo

Interface TransactionAwareTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Task
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskAdapter

    public interface TransactionAwareTask
extends Task
    Task executed by TaskExecutor.

    If a task given to TaskExecutor implements this interface and if a execute() method of TaskExecutor (e.g. execute(Task task, boolean transaction)) is called with the transaction parameter true, methods defined in this interface are called accordingly.

    Do not expect that either beforeTransactionCommit() or beforeTransactionRollback() is always called. Read the source code of TaskExecutor, and you will find there are cases where neither is called.

    Since:
    1.16
    Author:
    Takahiko Kawasaki
